channel.title: I have to be nice now
channel.description:
I have to be nice now, I was being mean for a long time to get 100 haters. I hope you can all see my good side now.
I'm also moderated so I will be modifying my main post.
[quote="IceTICKER"]Telenim, Hopefully you know the chances of you getting permanently banned are 65% Because of your post & Flaming people.[/quote]Yes I know the chances, I've had talks with moderators and Niall before, and I've been banned several times already.
[quote="TabbyKiller"]Evony is owned by a few Chinese kids who think they're cool by copying everyone's company details[/quote] Nice to know?
[quote="maminerr"]I HAVE FOUND AN ERROR WITH YOUR LIST!!!! 35. Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS 98. Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS[/quote] :(
